books.title: The Great Gatsby
books.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
books.notes: Beautiful prose and symbolism. The green light metaphor was particularly powerful.

books.title: Atomic Habits
books.author: James Clear
books.notes: Excellent framework for building good habits. The 1% better concept is game-changing.

books.title: The Seven Husbands of Evelyn Hugo
books.author: Taylor Jenkins Reid
books.notes: Captivating story with complex characters. Made me think about fame and love.

books.title: Dune
books.author: Frank Herbert
books.notes: Incredible world-building but quite dense. Taking my time with this one.

books.title: Beach Read
books.author: Emily Henry
books.notes: Perfect summer read! Witty dialogue and great chemistry between characters.
